activities.name: copy data ADLS to SQL addtional column

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT s.salesamount, p.*
FROM products AS p
INNER JOIN sales AS s ON p.productkey = s.productkey
WHERE TRY_CAST(s.salesamount AS FLOAT) < 3000;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select order_id, _Name, insertime 
from orders 
where insertime > '@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.date1}'

activities.name: Curated - Copy data within adls Parquet
